alert.note: Alert for Codington; Deuel; Grant (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 3:09AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Deuel, south central Grant and southeastern Codington Counties through 500 AM CDT... At 409 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dakota Sioux Casino, or near Watertown, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Watertown and Dakota Sioux Casino around 415 AM CDT. Rauville around 420 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Waverly, Kranzburg, Goodwin, School Lake and Bullhead Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
